content:
Prodam lepo ohranjen dlančnik HP Ipaq 4150 primeren za navigacijo.Naložen je garmin mobile XT. Zraven je USB kabel in avto polnilec



Lastnosti:
- Processor: Intel 400 MHz PXA255
- RAM: 64 MB + 32 MB ROM
- Display: 3.5" TFT active matrix - transflective - 16-bit (64k colours)
- Audio Output: Speaker(s)
- Audio Input: Microphone
- Wireless Connectivity: IrDA, Bluetooth, WLAN (Wi-Fi) 802.11b
- Input Device: Touch-screen, stylus
- Battery: Lithium Ion
- Operating System: Microsoft Windows CE 4.20 (Windows mobile 2003 SE)

Cena 140 Eur



Tel. 031/388-863
author: honda2
